titleStmt.title: A pleasant conceited historie, called The taming of a shrew As it was sundry times acted by the Right honorable the Earle of Pembrook his seruants.
Taming of a shrew.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Short and are to be sold by Cutbert Burbie, at his shop at the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The connection with Shakespeare's play is obscure.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
